official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require airlines which cancel flights to compensate passengers for the increased costs of taking alternative flights.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct air carriers that cancel flights to compensate ticketed passengers for the increased costs of taking alternative flights.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require airlines which cancel flights to compensate passengers for the increased costs of taking alternative flights.
